title: Thunderbird Privacy Notice tab keeps appearing.
content:
Why does the Thunderbird Privacy Notice tab keep appearing?

Is there a way to turn it off?
creator: leehsoon

title: Thunderbird marking wrongs items as spam
content: Since the last time I updated Thunderbird a few weeks ago, emails that I have always gotten are suddenly appearing in my spam folder instead of my inbox. I missed a couple of important emails because of this. Meanwhile, emails that are clearly spam are going to my inbox. How can this be corrected?
creator: b52balmer

title: TB Reinstalled -> Inbox, Sent Mail and all Subfolders Lost (AOL is mail provider)
content: TB reinstalled to remove glitches occurring for months, if not years. Upon reinstall, discovered emails from inbox, sent mail, subfolders were lost. In simple terms, can all of the years and years of emails from the AOL account (inbox, sent mail, subfolders) be retrieved and visible on TB again? Can go back to my computer support network for assistance but would like to give it a try myself. Novice. Thank you in advance for kind words and step by step instructions for dummies. What information is needed from me?
creator: dmax2
